thread.title: Mr John Wyse
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Mr John Wyse

author: Mr John Wyse
title: Mr John Wyse
text: I research the market each year for the best deals available and this time I plumped for Energia. I usually have to commit to a 12 month contract but that gives me certainty so no problems. I'm delighted with their service and have no reservations about recommending them to anyone doing the same thing.
